name: International Relations
description: The Department of International Relations was established in 1956 and is the only one of its kind in eastern India. Located in the main campus, the Department was the brainchild of Dr. Pritwish Chakraborty, an eminent Professor of his time. The Department offers Political Science (Hons.) course at the B.A. level and an M.A. degree in Political Science with International Relations. The M.Phil.  And Ph.D degrees are offered in International Relations.
